name: Hoshigami Remix
description:
Hoshigami Remix is a RPG-strategy game developed by Arc System Works and Pinegrow. It was originally released in 2007. Aksys Games published the game.
You can play Hoshigami Remix on Nintendo DS.
It was scored by Ikuko Mimori, Kennosuke Suemura, Mai Iida and Saori Kobayashi.
